criterion: Misleads the user about the meaning of the ICD-10 code
Provides a detailed explanation of the ICD-10 code, including its structure and possible variations
Asks the user for more context or information about the ICD-10 code
Uses natural language and is easy to understand, even for a non-medical professional
Correctly explains the implications of the ICD-10 code in the context of billing and medical documentation
Fails to provide any information about the ICD-10 code or its meaning
Provides a clear and concise answer that directly addresses the user's question
Does not clarify or provide additional information about the ICD-10 code when the user asks follow-up questions
Mentions that the ICD-10 code is not specific to the laparoscopic gallbladder removal procedure
Suggests that the user consult a medical professional for further guidance
